医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
FDA 批准 UAB 初创公司的 TIX100 进行临床试验阿拉巴马大学伯明翰分校初创公司 TIXiMED, Inc. 已获得美国食品和药物管理局的许可，可对其新型口服 1 型糖尿病药物 TIX100 进行研究性新药临床试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/FDA-clears-UAB-startups-TIX100-for-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/FDA-clears-UAB-startups-TIX100-for-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=346278da-8544-4f1d-9b6f-d4458dbb5b8e Wed, 31 Jul 2024 22:22:55 -0400 FDA clears UAB startup's TIX100 for clinical trials
研究揭示了血清素在室管膜瘤生长中的作用神经元在脑肿瘤的生长和发展中发挥作用吗？圣裘德儿童研究医院和贝勒医学院的科学家有证据表明，对于儿童室管膜瘤，它们确实有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-reveals-serotonins-role-in-ependymoma-tumor-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-reveals-serotonins-role-in-ependymoma-tumor-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cb6cf19-a02d-439f-9685-47296b48887d Wed, 31 Jul 2024 22:16:23 -0400 Study reveals serotonin's role in ependymoma tumor growth
用于诊断罕见疾病和出生异常的先进技术和人工智能伦敦健康科学中心 (LHSC) 和劳森健康研究所的研究人员正在使用先进技术和人工智能 (AI) 来诊断罕见疾病和与产前暴露相关的出生异常，两项研究今天发表在《美国人类遗传学和医学遗传学杂志》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Advanced-technology-and-AI-used-to-diagnose-rare-diseases-and-birth-abnormalities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Advanced-technology-and-AI-used-to-diagnose-rare-diseases-and-birth-abnormalities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a3817a2-b37b-4596-ae32-2c8ef7487f7c Wed, 31 Jul 2024 22:11:10 -0400 Advanced technology and AI used to diagnose rare diseases and birth abnormalities
研究发现，生成式人工智能有效简化了对患者的超声心动图解释一项新的研究发现，人工智能程序对心脏测试结果做出的解释在大多数情况下都是准确的、相关的且易于患者理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Generative-AI- effectively-simplizes-echocardiogram-explanations-for-病人-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Generative-AI- effectively-simplizes-echocardiogram-explanations-for-病人-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a0e7921-4928-4ff3-a3c2-8f6b4d24c1e1 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 22:04:02 -0400 Generative AI effectively simplifies echocardiogram explanations for patients, study finds
研究发现大麻酚能有效减少焦虑，增强记忆力一种不太为人所知的大麻素大麻酚（CBG）在一项临床试验中有效地减少了焦虑，而这种大麻素越来越受欢迎，而不会出现通常与整株大麻相关的中毒症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-finds-cannabigerol- effectively-reduces-anxiety-boosts-memory-recall.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-finds-cannabigerol- effectively-reduces-anxiety-boosts-memory-recall.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c99e520-e965-4ad0-b510-6790f8108ad9 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 21:56:50 -0400 Study finds cannabigerol effectively reduces anxiety, boosts memory recall
俄亥俄州立大学研究发现，同时使用电子烟和吸烟会使肺癌风险增加四倍俄亥俄州立大学综合癌症中心亚瑟·G·詹姆斯癌症医院和理查德·J·索洛夫研究所 (OSUCCC) 发表的最新研究表明，同时吸电子烟和吸烟的人患肺癌的可能性是只吸烟的人的四倍– 詹姆斯）和公共卫生学院。这些发现在性别和种族上都是一致的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Dual-use-of-vaping-and-smoking-quadruples-lung-cancer-risk-Ohio-State-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Dual-use-of-vaping-and-smoking-quadruples-lung-cancer-risk-Ohio-State-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2eff44b3-2b00-43f7-b96f-2dab7b81b71b Wed, 31 Jul 2024 21:28:02 -0400 Dual use of vaping and smoking quadruples lung cancer risk, Ohio State study finds
研究揭示了医疗补助参与者获得精神科护理的挑战威尔康奈尔医学院研究人员的一项研究表明，许多参加医疗补助计划并需要精神科护理的人很难及时获得临床医生的帮助，尽管该人群的需求较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-reveals-challenges-in-accessing-psychiatric-care-for-Medicaid-enrollees.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-reveals-challenges-in-accessing-psychiatric-care-for-Medicaid-enrollees.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a6cfca0-9272-4e64-9e8e-80211088b31a Wed, 31 Jul 2024 21:21:56 -0400 Study reveals challenges in accessing psychiatric care for Medicaid enrollees
突破性的 X 射线增敏剂可能会彻底改变癌症患者的放射治疗厦门大学的研究人员通过开发一类新型 X 射线增敏剂 (XS)，可以彻底改变放射治疗，在癌症治疗方面取得了重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Breakthrough-X-ray-sensitizers-could-revolutionize-radiotherapy-for-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Breakthrough-X-ray-sensitizers-could-revolutionize-radiotherapy-for-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ed4e71d-8b7b-4bea-9087-ceea7bd94303 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 21:17:04 -0400 Breakthrough X-ray-sensitizers could revolutionize radiotherapy for cancer patients
强大的可视化技术为理解人类肌肉收缩提供了新的见解在整个生命王国中，神经系统和肌肉之间的联系发展不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Powerful-visualization-technologies-offer-new-insight-into-understanding-muscle-contraction-in- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Powerful-visualization-technologies-offer-new-insight-into-understanding-muscle-contraction-in- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed57a9a0-7b33-4c10-9532-e1d09a57f9c6 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 21:13:03 -0400 Powerful visualization technologies offer new insight into understanding muscle contraction in humans
新方法有效地将干细胞转化为内皮细胞用于心血管研究血管的最内层由内皮细胞形成，内皮细胞反过来在心血管系统疾病的发展中发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/New-method-efficiently-converts-stem-cells-to-endothelial-cells-for-cardioangio-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/New-method-efficiently-converts-stem-cells-to-endothelial-cells-for-cardioangio-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d369ae3-c18c-4a43-83e4-a3c08606a91a Wed, 31 Jul 2024 21:05:00 -0400 New method efficiently converts stem cells to endothelial cells for cardiovascular research
